original_text: I call heaven and earth to witness against you this day, that ye shall soon utterly perish from off the land whereunto ye go over Jordan to possess it; ye shall not prolong your days upon it, but shall utterly be destroyed.
korean_text: 내가 오늘 천지를 불러 증거를 삼노니 너희가 요단을 건너가서 얻는 땅에서 속히 망할 것이라 너희가 거기서 너희의 날이 길지 못하고 전멸될 것이니라

sentences.original_text: to witness against you this day
sentences.korean_translation: 오늘 너희를 반증하기 위해 증인이 되게 하노라

sentences.original_text: that ye shall soon utterly perish
whereunto ye go over Jordan to possess it
ye shall not prolong your days upon it
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그 땅에서 너희 날을 길게 못하리라
